sbe:messageSchema.description: Internal messaging format used by the FIX Gateway

composite.name: messageHeader
composite.description: Message identifiers and length of message root

validValue.name: REMOTE_DISCONNECT
validValue.description: The TCP connection was disconnected remotely

validValue.name: APPLICATION_DISCONNECT
validValue.description: We disconnected due an application level request

validValue.name: LIBRARY_DISCONNECT
validValue.description: We disconnected due to its library disconnecting

validValue.name: ENGINE_SHUTDOWN
validValue.description: We disconnected the connection due to the engine shutting down

validValue.name: EXCEPTION
validValue.description: We disconnected due to the engine receiving an IOException

validValue.name: SLOW_CONSUMER
validValue.description: We disconnected due to the consumer being too slow at reading the connection

validValue.name: NO_LOGON
validValue.description: We disconnected due to no logon message being sent after a timeout

validValue.name: DUPLICATE_SESSION
validValue.description: We disconnected due the session id being the same as one already connected

validValue.name: INVALID_BODY_LENGTH
validValue.description: We disconnected due a message having an invalid body length field

validValue.name: LOGOUT
validValue.description: We disconnected due to receiving a logout message

validValue.name: FIRST_MESSAGE_NOT_LOGON
validValue.description: We disconnected due to the first message that we received not being a logon

validValue.name: INCORRECT_BEGIN_STRING
validValue.description: We disconnected due begin string field was invalid

validValue.name: MSG_SEQ_NO_TOO_LOW
validValue.description: We disconnected due to the message sequence number being too low

validValue.name: MSG_SEQ_NO_MISSING
validValue.description: We disconnected due to the message sequence number field being missing

validValue.name: INVALID_SENDING_TIME
validValue.description: We disconnected due an invalid sending time field in the fix message

validValue.name: NEGATIVE_HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL
validValue.description: We disconnected due to a negative heartbeat interval field

validValue.name: FAILED_AUTHENTICATION
validValue.description: We disconnected due to the authentication strategy returning false

validValue.name: INVALID_FIX_MESSAGE
validValue.description: We disconnected due to codec validation failing

validValue.name: CONNECTING
validValue.description: The session is connecting or reconnecting.

validValue.name: CONNECTED
validValue.description: A machine has connected to the gateway, but hasn't logged in yet. Initial state of a session.

validValue.name: SENT_LOGON
validValue.description: Initiator only state - sent logon message but it hasn't received the reply yet.

validValue.name: ACTIVE
validValue.description: Session is fully authenticated and ready to execute.

validValue.name: AWAITING_RESEND
validValue.description: Login had too high a sequence number and a resend or gap fill is required.

validValue.name: LOGGING_OUT
validValue.description: Session is trying to send logout, will retry sending until not backpressured

validValue.name: LOGGING_OUT_AND_DISCONNECTING
validValue.description: Session is trying to send logout and the disconnect, will retry sending until not backpressured

validValue.name: AWAITING_LOGOUT
validValue.description: Linger between logout request and a logout acknowledgement. You can do resend processing at this point, but no other messages.

validValue.name: DISCONNECTING
validValue.description: Session is trying to disconnect, will retry disconnecting until not backpressured

validValue.name: DISCONNECTED
validValue.description: Session has been disconnected and can't send messages.

validValue.name: DISABLED
validValue.description: DISCONNECTED and unable to reconnect.

validValue.name: OK
validValue.description: Operation Succeeded

validValue.name: UNKNOWN_SESSION
validValue.description: The gateway doesn't know about the specified connection id

validValue.name: UNKNOWN_LIBRARY
validValue.description: The gateway doesn't know about your library

validValue.name: OTHER_SESSION_OWNER
validValue.description: Another library owns that session

validValue.name: SESSION_NOT_LOGGED_IN
validValue.description: The session hasn't logged in yet so you can't replay anything

validValue.name: SEQUENCE_NUMBER_TOO_HIGH
validValue.description: Can't replay to that sequence number: haven't archived it yet

validValue.name: MISSING_MESSAGES
validValue.description: We can't find the required number of messages in the log
